sentence.Network_en: Anything was preferable to the tense atmosphere at home.
sentence.Network_cn: 什么都比家里的紧张气氛好。

sentence.Network_en: Health without riches is preferable to riches without health.
sentence.Network_cn: 有健康而无财富比有财富而无健康更好.

sentence.Network_en: Any principle is preferable to none.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何原则都比没原则好.

means.word_mean: 较好的,较合人意的;选好的

entry.tran: 更好的；更可取的；更合适的
entry.def: If you say that one thing is preferable to another, you mean that it is more desirable or suitable.

example.ex: A big earthquake a long way off is preferable to a smaller one nearby...
example.tran: 远处发生大地震总比在附近发生小地震好。

example.ex: The hazards of the theatre seemed preferable to joining the family paint business...
example.tran: 经营剧院的风险似乎比加入家族涂料产业的风险要小一些。

auth_sentence.content: The most abject poverty is preferable to domestic service.
auth_sentence.res_content: The most abject poverty is preferable to domestic service.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The most abject poverty is preferable to domestic service.

auth_sentence.content: Experience of dealing with large pharmaceutical companies is preferable.
auth_sentence.res_content: Experience of dealing with large pharmaceutical companies is preferable.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Experience of dealing with large pharmaceutical companies is preferable.

auth_sentence.content: Their sensuality made them far preferable as companions to men.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their sensuality made them far preferable as companions to men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their sensuality made them far preferable as companions to men.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"可以……的,能……的"; 2. 注：如果加在y结尾的单词后通常为去掉y加上icalbe.

stems_affixes.word_buile: love爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可爱的,惹人爱的
accept接受,承认+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可接受的,合意的
adjust调整+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可调整的
break破坏+able可以……的,能……的→adj.会破的,易碎的
change改变+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可改变的
conceive构思,以为+able形容词结尾→adj.可想象的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的
stems_affixes.word_buile: desire想望,期望+able可以……的,能……的→adj.值得做的;合意的,称心的;期望得到的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: favor好感,宠爱+able可以……的,能……的→adj.赞成的,有利的,赞许的,良好的
im不+pregn攻击+able可以……的,能……的→adj.攻不破的,征服不了的
inflame使燃烧+able可以……的,能……的→inflammable可燃烧的,可激怒的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+viol违反,冒犯+able可以……的,能……的→adj.不可侵犯的,不可亵渎的
know知道+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可知的
obtain获得,得到+able可以……的,能……的→adj.能得到的,可到手的
predict预言+able可以……的,能……的→adj.可预言的
prefer更喜欢,宁愿+able可以……的,能……的→adj.更可取的,更好的
tract拉+able可以……的,能……的→能够拉[回来]→易管的

means.word_mean: 更好的, 更适合的, 更可取的

sentences.en: Health without riches is preferable to riches without health.
sentences.cn: 有健康而无财富比有财富而无健康更好。

jushi.english: Health without riches is preferable to riches without health.
jushi.chinese: 有健康而无财富比有财富而无健康更好。
